title: Bug 102623: Image not refreshed after re-importing
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the image does not refresh when imported again.
EB: The image should refresh and display the newly imported image after importing it again.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Import a new image called 'image1.jpg' into the layout
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'
4. Import 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
